meta.title: Home - Alex Rubio Portfolio
meta.description: Personal portfolio of Alex Rubio - Full-Stack Developer & QA specialized in Vue.js, Nuxt 3, Node.js and testing. Experience in IoT and blockchain.

responses.about:
Full-Stack Developer & QA

I'm Alex Rubio, a full-stack developer and QA specialist with experience creating robust and scalable web solutions.

Salamanca, Spain
Computer Engineering Graduate
BISITE Research Group

I'm passionate about building modern applications with the latest technologies and ensuring their quality through thorough testing.

responses.help:
Available commands:

  about       - Information about me
  stack       - Technologies I use
  experience  - My work experience

You can also use the quick buttons below the terminal.
